name: seo-audit-etl
title: SEO Audit ETL (ZIP â†’ normalized JSON + scores)
description: Downloads a dated audit ZIP, parses CSV/JSON with robust fallbacks (Ahrefs UTF-16 TSV, nested zips), aggregates small metrics, computes proportional OSS/LSS with coverage, and outputs normalized_audit.json, scores.json, etl_manifest.json.

input.title: Audit ETL Input
input.description: Provide the client details and a public/signed URL to the dated audit ZIP.

client.title: Client slug
client.description: Short identifier for the client (e.g., acme).

runDate.title: Run date
runDate.description: Date label for this audit run (YYYY-MM-DD).

zipUrl.title: ZIP URL
zipUrl.description: Public or signed URL to the dated audit ZIP (e.g., Google Drive direct download link).
